description:
Tree Works Application in St Johnâ€™s Conservation Area, 19 Cathcart Hill, Islington London N19 5QW

An application has been received to do the following work at the above address.

Front:
-	False Acacia, (T77)
o	Crown thin by 20%
o	Removal of deadwood in the crown
o	Crown lift to 3.5 metres 

-	Rowan, (T76)
o	Crown lift to 2.0 metre 
o	Balance crown
o	Removal of deadwood crossing and rubbing branches equal to 5% thin.

Rear Garden:

-	Sycamore(T65)
o	Sever Ivy around the base, and remove when died.
o	Crown thin by 25%
o	Remove deadwood
-	Sycamore(T64)
o	Twin stemmed, crown thin by 25% remove smaller competing leader and crown reduce crown by 15-20% to balance crown.
o	Removal of deadwood
-	Sycamore(T63)
o	Crowns reduce by 15% crown thin by 5-10% balance crown.
-	Lime(T62)
o	Remove epicormic growth to 4.0 metres
o	Crown thin by 5-10%
o	Remove deadwood
